text: nowpel del puokke ban chaul tow chuob da voud haey ke mean karphyokhlach puokke puokke ban niyeay tha saum anak kom khlach avei . puok yeung teangpir chhlohbrakek knea daoy puok yeung ban bampean towleu knea . dau che neah saum anak me tda katsechakdei rveang puok yeung daoy you tde thmr phng haey saum anak kom lomieng aoy saoh ning saum anak changaoulobangheanh puok yeung towkean meakra del troemotrauv phng choh
